question: The Cotton Corporation of India (CCI) is to set up its own Cotton Warehouse in which country?
explanation:
The Cotton Corporation of India (CCI) is to set up its own Cotton warehouse in Vietnam, to boost Exports.
A government-to-government Memorandum of Understanding is also being prepared to export 1.5-2 million bales of cotton to Bangladesh.  CCI holds surplus stocks of cotton before the next harvest season and this plan has been made.
